requirements: Prerequisites: C&MP 550 and permission of the instructor. Credit for full year only.
description:
Two-term course taught in groups of ten to twelve students by the same group leader(s) throughout the year. Workshop format permits students to apply basic concepts of physiology to clinical syndromes and disease processes. Students are expected to participate actively in a weekly discussion of a clinical case that illustrates principles of human physiology and pathophysiology at the whole-body, system, organ, cellular, or molecular level.
Prerequisites: C&MP 550 and permission of the instructor. Credit for full year only.
